arts.ttl: Baku reflects on St. Pauli win: "Not the prettiest of victories"
arts.sum: It wasn't always pretty, but Leipzig got the win against St. Pauli - and that's all that matters, said Ridle Baku after the game.

arts.ttl: Benjamin Šeško and Xavi help RB Leipzig overcome stubborn St. Pauli despite red card
arts.sum: RB Leipzig secured a hard-fought 2-0 win against St. Pauli with goals from Benjamin Šeško and Xavi Simons. Benjamin Šeško celebrates after opening the scoring for Leipzig in the 16th minute - Stuart Franklin

arts.ttl: Cultures collide as Leipzig sees off St. Pauli's challenge to stay 4th in Bundesliga
arts.sum: Leipzig was founded by energy drink manufacturer Red Bull to promote its product in 2009, when Hamburg-based St. Pauli was already known for its anti-establishment stance and the pirate skull-and-crossbones emblem popularized by supporters who identified as punks. Xavi Simons and Benjamin Šeško scored and Leipzig held on to defend fourth place in the Bundesliga with a 2-0 win over promoted St. Pauli on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Ten man RB Leipzig ease past St. Pauli
arts.sum: RB Leipzig managed to see out a win against St Pauli on Sunday in the Bundesliga in spite of being reduced to ten men in the second half as Willi Orban got sent off.

arts.ttl: Sunday's Bundesliga predictions including RB Leipzig vs. St Pauli
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including RB Leipzig vs. St Pauli.
RB Leipzig will look to end a four-game winless league run when they welcome St. Pauli to the Red Bull Arena on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Preview: RB Leipzig vs. St Pauli - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between RB Leipzig and St Pauli, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
